response.original_title: Dr. Arnold Loxam Celebrates Beside the Seaside
response.overview: Dear Viewer  Welcome to Dr. Arnold Loxam Celebrates Beside the Seaside. Melodies both old and new, loved ones and forgotten ones, which I play on the organ of the Tower Ballroom, Blackpool, Heysham Parish Church and the piano of the Grand Midland Hotel in Morecambe.  Items include Rock Gospel, Sunset over Morecambe Bay, Chorus of the Hebrew Slaves, Quicksteps, Foxtrots, Military Two Step and my own Last Night of the Proms.  Happy Viewing
response.title: Dr. Arnold Loxam Celebrates Beside the Seaside
